entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 07:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few rain showers beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 07:45 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with wet snow except periods of snow inland overnight. Snowfall amount 4 cm inland. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia late this evening and overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 07:45 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
